data.title: City of Centerville, Dayton,Ohio

data.text:
Directory Profile

City of Centerville

100 West Spring Valley Rd

Centerville, OH, 45458

Official profile for the City of Centerville

2024 Cornerstone Music Series

8/16/2024

The Cornerstone Music Series will take place at the Cornerstone Park Pavilion, located at 5210 Cornerstone North Blvd. between Costco and Cooper's Hawk Winery & Restaurant.

2024 Uptown Music Series

8/23/2024

The Uptown Music Series in Centerville will continue this year on the patio space on the northeast corner of Franklin and Main streets near Graeterâ€™s and City Barbeque.

Fall Festival in Centerville

10/05/2024

Fall family festival with hayrides, inflatables, face painting, games and more in Centerville.

Centerville Americana Festival returns with 50th-anniversary celebration

3/29/2022: Dayton, OH - Americana Festival returns in 2022-plans to expand with more live music, street vendors and family-friendly experiences.

Centerville Launches Program to Reduce Recycling Contamination

8/12/2021: Dayton, OH - The City of Centerville has launched a summer-long, grant-funded campaign to reduce recycling contamination supported by the Montgomery County Solid Waste District and Rumpke Recycling.

Centerville Plans More Trails, Signs for Stubbs Park

3/04/2021: Dayton, OH - The City of Centerville hopes to expand trails, trail-head facilities and signage in Stubbs.

Centerville to Recycle 500 Pounds of Plastic Bags and Film

2/23/2021: Dayton, OH - The City of Centerville is partnering with Centerville-Washington Park District and Washington-Centerville Public Library to collect 500 pounds of recyclable plastic film
